title: The
NotifyPropertyChangedBase
c
class below defines a generic Set method that can be called from any derived type.

title: To use this generic Set method, you simply need to create a class that derives from NotifyPropertyChangedBase.

title: As shown above, you can call
Set(ref _fieldName, value);
c
in a property’s setter and it will automatically raise a PropertyChanged event if it is needed.

title: You can then register to the PropertyChanged event from another class that needs to handle property changes.
